Def.label: Is Psion
Def.description: Removes all targets which are not psions from the target pool.\n\nWhen inverted, removes all targets which are psions from the pool.

Def.label: Is Downed
Def.description: Removes all targets which are not downed from the target pool.\n\nWhen inverted, removes all targets which are downed from the pool.

Def.label: Pain Threshold
Def.description: Removes all targets which are in less than a certain amount of pain from the target pool.\n\nWhen inverted, removes all targets which are in more than a certain amount of pain from the pool.

Def.label: Health Percent Threshold
Def.description: Removes all targets which have less than a certain health percent from the target pool.\n\nWhen inverted, removes all targets which have more than a certain health percent from the pool.

Def.label: Mood Threshold
Def.description: Removes all targets which have less than a certain mood percent from the target pool.\n\nWhen inverted, removes all targets which have more than a certain mood percent from the pool.

Def.label: Psi Energy Threshold
Def.description: Removes all targets which have less than a certain amount of psi energy from the target pool.\n\nWhen inverted, removes all targets which have more than a certain amount of psi energy from the pool.

Def.label: Psion Level Threshold
Def.description:
Removes all targets which are at less than a certain psion level from the target pool.

When inverted, removes all targets which have more than a certain psion level from the pool.

Psion level is the combination of energy and focus level. It ranges from 2 to 6. Note that this threshold is inclusive.
